text: guys, referring to serverless functions. Is it allowed to use so-generated endpoints in workflows?
I am not too familiar with `so-generated` endpoints in workflows. Can you explain what you mean by that?

:slightly_smiling_face: so-generated was not a keyword. let me reformulate:
is it allowed to use HubSpot hosted serverless endpoints in workflows?
Through the webhook trigger? I haven’t tested it but I don’t see why it wouldn’t work
because of the possible rate of workflows which could be more than 60/minute
for example if you enroll a list of contacts
Hm I wonder if that use case would be better suited for a different tool. CMS serverless is more about integrating data closer to content vs. raw processing of data

Yes, Serverless functions are intended to be used along with the display of your website. For something that’s doing data processing, you will likely run over your rate limits of either calls or duration.
it's a pity, but I understand why :slightly_smiling_face:
